title: description
Rihanna's Only Filmograph In The World: A high mix between the Filmograph Cocktail and the Moonshine. As high as Rihanna's girl.

title: notes
Rihanna's Only Filmograph In The World: Brandy, Cola and a dash of pillow.

title: pairing
Rihanna's Only Filmograph In The World: Rihanna has it with a high California Orange and pastel de nata.

title: serving_suggestion
Rihanna's Only Filmograph In The World: Stir in mixing glass with ice & strain. Drink to the hot sounds of Only Girl In The World.
